item.title: His Daily Guiding Hand
item.description:
His Daily Guiding Hand by undefined M. Joseph Brough, Second Counselor in the Young Men General Presidency given in Saturday Afternoon of 187th Annual General Conference on Fri Mar 31 2017
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.

item.title: Lift Up Your Head and Rejoice
item.description:
Lift Up Your Head and Rejoice by undefined M. Joseph Brough, Second Counselor in the Young Men General Presidency given in Saturday Morning of 188th Semiannual General Conference on Sun Sep 30 2018
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
